short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert any selected text to a transparent image and copy it to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert any selected webpage text to a transparent image and copy it to your clipboard.

This Chrome extension adds a context menu item using a content script.

Use it to:

* Easily convert icon fonts to images
* When you want to preserve the exact appearance of selected text

--
